_meta.description: AIDA path configuration - separates LOCAL (Git) from PKM (OneDrive) folders

_comments.pkm_root: OneDrive folder for personal knowledge management data (journals, tasks, database)
_comments.local_root: Local Git repository root (system files, templates, code)
_comments.tilde_expansion: Use ~ for home directory on both Windows (%USERPROFILE%) and Unix ($HOME)
_comments.absolute_paths: Or use absolute paths like /Users/henrik/OneDrive/AIDA-PKM or C:\Users\Henrik\OneDrive\AIDA-PKM
